div.ab:
بسم اللّه
لأبى الحكم أمّا بعد أصلح
اللّه لك أمرك كلّه
أتجر أتجرّ اتّجر في نطيق نطيق يرحمك
اللّه فإنّه مسكين
وليس يهمّك ما عليه
إن شا اللّه
ذكر لي أنّك
تسله خمسة أثواب
فهي الآن في بيته
يريد أن يأتيك بها
وإنّما عليه
في هذا الطّبل
ثلثة دننير فأضع
عنه ما أحــســنــت أحببت إليه ø

bi smi ăl lāhi
li ʾabī ăl ḥakami ʾammā baʿdu ʾaṣlaḥa
ăl lāhu la ka ʾamra ka kulla hu
ʾa ĭttaǧir tǧr tuǧirru fī baṭīqa naṭīqa yarḥamu ka
ăl lāhu fa ʾinna hu miskīn:un
wa laysa yahummu ka mā ʿalay hi
ʾin šāʾa ăl lāhu
ḏakara l ī ʾanna ka
tasalu hu ḫamsaẗa ʾaṯwāb:in
fa hiya ăl ʾāna fī bayti hi
yurīdu ʾan yaʾtiya ka bi hā
wa ʾinnamā ʿalay hi
fī hāḏā ăṭ ṭabli
ṯalāṯaẗa danānīra fa ʾaḍiʿ
ʿan hu mā ʾaḥsanta ʾaḥbabta ʾilay ø hi ø
***************

In the name of God!
To Abuʾl-Ḥakam. Thereafter. May God well arrange
for thee all thy affairs.
Erwirb Dir bezüglich Baṭīqs (durch ein entgegenkommendes Verhalten) Verdienst (im Jenseits) – Gott erbarme Thou implorest (God's) protection respecting Baṭīq? May God Wirst Du bezüglich Batīq einen Zahlungsaufschub gewähren?
have mercy upon thee, for he is poor, sich Deiner -, denn er ist arm.
and that which he owes is not so important for thee,
if God wills.
He related to me that thou
askest him about five pieces of cloth;
they are now in his house,
he will bring them to thee,
but he owes
on the account of his (tax-) instalment
three dînârs. Thus grant ... Ziehe
as much as a deduction as thou kindly mightest be able to do for him...... ihm also, was auch immer du beliebst.
